item.description: Here is a Novel Tribute to an Unparalleled Legend – Dr Bhupen Hazarika 8th September marks the 96th birth anniversary of Dr Bhupen Hazarika, popularly known as the Bard of Brahmaputra.

item.title: A Woman Dedicated to Music, Verse and Prose
item.description: A Woman Dedicated to Music, Verse and Prose Maitrayee Patar, who is hailed among the rising stars of the music industry of Assam, is also a prolific poet and writer.
